extensionDescription.message:
Double-click the image to save it. 
If there is already a file with the same file name, the save dialog will open. Save the file with any name.

option_label_save_dir_name_remark.message:
You can save in the Firefox options screen
It will be under the directory selected in "Files and Applications> Downloads> Save files to".
If you want to save it to another location, 
create a junction in the directory specified in Firefox options. 
Example : mklink /J C:\Users\{user_name}\Downloads\from C:\to
